Summary: If you watched it, it would have 3 of the same in the sky they moved so fast.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Dundee
There were no other sightings in Dundee on or around August 1st 2011
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
divs: Sighting DetailsI started to lie down in bed with the curtains open and decided to lay down and look at the stars when I noticed this thing flying high in the sky, as I paid more attention to it, the object got started moving in no way I've seen before. It was making moves like no aircraft made by man had made before. At first I thought I was just seeing things, but as I watched it move the way it did another one seemed to appear and take my eye off that one and as I watched the other one I went back to look at the one I had seen and it was gone and no longer there. As I now watched this one it changed too and another then appeared and the same thing happened. I felt my heart race for a bit. but I then needed to get my camera so I could get a picture as I came back to get a picture the things had all gone.
